divs: Sighting Detailswoke up at 5 in the morning just staring out the window when i saw a huge blue ball bouncing back and fourth into my vision that's when i ran to my roomates room, he or she wouldn't get up. so i grabbed the recorder and watched this crazy ball dance around and change shapes for several minutes before it shot off...
Summary: I saw at only 1 blue orb in the sky by the naked eye but when looked at on the disk there were at least four.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hot Springs
There were no other sightings in Hot Springs on or around January 7th 2011
